com.soa.rs.discordbot.bot

Class ReadyEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.rs.discordbot.bot.ReadyEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    sx.blah.discord.api.events.IListener<sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.ReadyEvent>

    public class ReadyEventListener
extends Object
implements sx.blah.discord.api.events.IListener<sx.blah.discord.handle.impl.events.ReadyEvent>
    The Ready Event Listener handles the configuration of bot settings along with starting any automated tasks which will run periodically during the bot's runtime. The ReadyEvent is triggered upon the bot being ready to interact with the Discord API.
